name: Diancie ◇
rules: ◇ (Prism Star) Rule: You can't have more than 1 ◇ card with the same name in your deck. If a ◇ card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.

abilities.name: Princess's Cheers
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Fighting Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Diamond Rain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Benched Pokémon.

flavorText: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.
